name: Tar Ooze
description: A Large ooze creature that can grapple and deal physical damage with its pseudopods, the Tar Ooze is covered in thick, black tar and emits a foul odor. It is slow-moving yet resilient in combat.
memorable: It creates fire hazards when damaged by fire while also having the capability to produce tar that can ensnare and harm attackers.
goals: To engulf and incapacitate opponents, causing them to become tarred and potentially turn into tar ghouls.
relations: Related to other forms of ooze or similar creatures. Often a danger in areas of difficult terrain.
environment: Typically found in swampy or marshy areas where its abilities can be further utilized.
strengths: Immunities to fire, necrotic, and poison damage make it a durable opponent, along with various condition immunities.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity score limits its ability to dodge attacks and respond quickly.
attacks: Employs pseudopods for melee attacks, capable of inflicting both bludgeoning and necrotic damage, as well as hurling tar at foes.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Hazard: Ignites when taking fire damage, causing additional fire damage to those who touch it, while boosting its own attacks.
senses: Blindsight out to 60 feet allows it to sense its surroundings despite being blind beyond that radius.
additional_information: Can cause major battlefield control with sticky tar and fire hazards.
Creates lasting effects through its ability to raise tar ghouls from fallen foes.
Slow-moving but resilient, making it a challenging opponent to face head-on.
test_queries: slow-moving tar creature with fire abilities
monster that creates sticky tar hazards
large ooze that ignites when damaged by fire
undead creature that rises from tar-covered bodies
impeding ooze that hurls tar at foes
